sense.def:
A gesture
je premik, ki ga naredimo z rokami ali glavo, da bi izrazili čustvo ali posredovali informacije.

seg.quote: She made an angry gesture with her fist.

gramGrp.pos:
REPORT VB
or
VB
with
ADJUNCT

sense.def:
To gesture
pomeni uporabljati roke ali glavo za izražanje čustva ali posredovanje informacij.

seg.quote: She gestured that I ought to wait.
He gestured to me to lie down.

sense.def:
A gesture
je tudi nekaj, kar rečemo ali storimo, da bi pokazali svoje mišljenje ali namero.

seg.quote: The demonstration is a gesture of defiance.
